title: CBS Radio Mystery Theater and Five Minute Mysteries
description: This time on Case Closed, The CBS Radio Mystery Theater brings us their adaptation of The Musgrave Ritual. That story aired August 31, 1981. content:encoded:
This time on Case Closed, The CBS Radio Mystery Theater brings us their adaptation of The Musgrave Ritual. That story aired August 31, 1981.

(53:26) Five Minute Mysteries closes this week’s show with Toast To Death, an episode that aired sometime in the 1940’s.
